privacyPolicy.title: 1. Introduction
privacyPolicy.content: Welcome to bChamp. We are committed to protecting your privacy and providing a safe, secure experience for all our users. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, share, and protect your personal information.

privacyPolicy.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
content: Communicate with you about your account and our services
Analyze usage patterns to enhance our platform

privacyPolicy.title: 4. Data Sharing and Disclosure
content: Service providers who assist in our operations
Educational institutions or employers, with your explicit consent
Legal authorities when required by law

privacyPolicy.title: 5. Data Security
privacyPolicy.content: We implement robust security measures to protect your data, including encryption, access controls, and regular security audits.

privacyPolicy.title: 6. Your Rights and Choices
content: Access and update your personal information
Request deletion of your account and associated data
Object to the processing of your personal data

privacyPolicy.title: 7. Changes to This Policy
privacyPolicy.content: We may update this policy periodically. We will notify you of any significant changes via email or through a prominent notice on our platform.

privacyPolicy.title: 8. Contact Us
privacyPolicy.content: If you have any questions about this policy, please contact us.
